colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005B (ZHES DPAL LDAN LHA MO 'DOD KHAMS DBANG PHYUG MA'I THUGS DAM BSKANG BA DANG, 'GAL RKYEN GYI 'TSUB LHONG SOGS ZHI BA LA MCHOG TU BSNGAGS PAS, SROG CHAGS RGU SKONGS DANG, BAm SKONGS KYI CHO GA NYES PA KUN SEL ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, SPYIR YANG SNYIGS MAR SBYOR BA'I DBANG GIS MA MO MKHA' 'GRO 'KHRUGS PA'I 'TSUB LHONGS KYIS BSKYED PA'I NAD GDON SHIN TU MANG PA DANG, LHAG PAR LO SNGA PHYIR TE BSKOR DU NAD RIMS RIGS MI 'DRA BA MANG DU 'CHED CING, MI SHIS PA'I LHAS MTSAN SNA TSOGS BYUNG BA, BSRUNG MA'I 'KHU LDOG GI RNAM PA YIN PA DANG, BSKONGS BSHAGS MANG DU BTANG NA LEGS PA'I MTSAN MA KUN RTOGS KYI RI MOR SHAR BA BZHIN, ,LAG LEN DU BSTAR SKABS, ^BTZUN GZUGS DHARMA BADZRA GYIS BAm SKONGS KYI CHO GA LHO BRAG GRUB CHEN LAS KYI RDO RJE'I GSUNG LA TSIGS PHRAD CUNG ZAD BSGYUR CING, LAG LEN GSAL BAR BGYIS STE, DBEN GNAS BDE CHEN CHOS GLING DU GLAG CHOG CHU 'BABS SU BKOD PA 'DIS KYANG MI MTHUN NYER 'TSE THAMS CAD ZHI ZHING, 'DOD KHAMS DBANG MO DGYES PAS 'PHRIN LAS RNAM BZHI LHUN GYIS GRUB PAR GYUR CIG ,@006A *, ,'DI GNYAN PAS, GANG THOD THOD DU BYA MI RUNG GSUNG BAS SNOD MIN LA GSANG SHING SKABS SHES PAR BYA'O, ,BKRA SHIS, ,)
